sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnindvdlpgecntnts ( CNTNTS_ID /* */ , CNTNTS_NM /* */ , CNTC_URL /* */ , CNTNTS_USE_AT /* */ , CNTNTS_LINK_URL /* */ , CNTNTS_DC /* */ ) VALUES ( #cntntsId# /* */ , #cntntsNm# /* */ , #cntcUrl# /* */ , #cntntsUseAt# /* */ , #cntntsLinkUrl# /* */ , #cntntsDc# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnindvdlpgecntnts SET CNTNTS_ID=#cntntsId# /* */ , CNTNTS_NM=#cntntsNm# /* */ , CNTC_URL=#cntcUrl# /* */ , CNTNTS_USE_AT=#cntntsUseAt# /* */ , CNTNTS_LINK_URL=#cntntsLinkUrl# /* */ , CNTNTS_DC=#cntntsDc# /* */ WHERE CNTNTS_ID=#cntntsId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CNTNTS_ID /* */ , CNTNTS_NM /* */ , CNTC_URL /* */ , CNTNTS_USE_AT /* */ , CNTNTS_LINK_URL /* */ , CNTNTS_DC /* */ FROM comtnindvdlpgecntnts WHERE CNTNTS_ID=#cntntsId# /* */

SELECT CNTNTS_ID /* */ , CNTNTS_NM /* */ , CNTC_URL /* */ , CNTNTS_USE_AT /* */ , CNTNTS_LINK_URL /* */ , CNTNTS_DC /* */ FROM comtnindvdlpgecntnts WHERE 1=1
CNTNTS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CNTNTS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CNTNTS_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

CNTNTS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
